name: Bedsure Orthopedic Dog Beds Large Sized Dog - Washable Large Dog Cat Bed Waterproof, Comfort Dogs Couch Sofa with Washable Removable Cover, Pet Bed with Nonskid Bottom, Grey, 35"
short_description: Orthopedic Support: Our orthopedic cat sofa is designed to give your pet unparalleled support for a deep, dreamy sleep. High-density egg-crate foam helps distribute weight evenly and provides the perfect amount of pressure relief and joint support.

Enhanced Comfort: The 4-sided bolster design promotes ultimate comfort and security, offering your pet a variety of cozy positions to snuggle. The cushioned bolster shape is deeply filled to support your pet’s head and neck for a more restful sleep. And the lowered entrance protects your pet's knees and promotes accessibility.
Waterproof & Easy Care: The cover features a laminated waterproof layer that helps protect against spills and accidents. Simply unzip and remove the cover for quick machine washing and easy care.
Tested & Pet Approved: This supportive Pet bed is wrapped in our velvety soft flannel fabric, offering soothing comfort that your furry friend will find cozy and relaxing.

Pet Safe Materials: This standard 100 by OEKO-TEX(24.HCN.46956) certified pet bed consists of CertiPUR-US certified foam and luxurious flannel, creating a safe and comfortable space for your furry friend to rest and recharge. The non-skid bottom reduces slips and protects your dog.

MULTI-SIZE FIT FOR ALL BREEDS - Designed as a haven for dogs of all sizes, from medium to extra-large. Available in multiple sizes to ensure a perfect fit, providing ample room for your pet to stretch out or curl up in total relaxation.

CARE GUIDELINES - Features a removable, machine-washable cover with a convenient zipper for easy cleaning (foam is not washable). Please allow 24-48 hours after unpacking for the memory foam to fully inflate to its original shape.

name: KSIIA Orthopedic Dog Bed Dog Crate Bed Waterproof for Large Dogs Deluxe Plush Washable Pet Mat with Egg Crate Foam & Removable Cover, 35 x 22 Inch, Gray
short_description: Orthopedic Support - Our dog crate bed equips a 3-inch thick high-density egg crate foam, which helps evenly distribute our dog's weight, comfort our dogs with strong support to bones and joint, effectively relieves joint pain and arthritis, encourages deep and restful sleep, especially for puppies and older dogs.

Ultra-soft & Waterproof - The sleeping area of the waterproof dog bed is made of 3-layer fabric. The outer deluxe plush surface is soft and skin-friendly. The middle TPU waterproof layer prevents liquid from penetrating, so that the foam won't get wet. The inner knit fabric lining is durable enough for long time use.

Removable Cover & Durable Zipper - The outer cover of the pet bed is equipped with a premium L-shaped zipper, which is smooth and durable, makes it very easy to remove. The cover is machine washable for easy care. The upgraded fabric and reinforced stitches ensure the cover remains as good as new after multiple washes.

Two-sided Design - One side of the dog bed features ultra-soft deluxe plush velvet, provides a warm shelter for our pet to snug in the cold weather. While the other side is made of Oxford fabric, it helps keep our dog cool in summer. The Oxford fabric is also durable enough to hold up to daily wear and tear.

Size & Using Occasions - This orthopedic dog bed measures 35"L x 22"W x 3"H, for dogs up to 50lbs. It can be used as a dog crate pad, dog pillow, dog mattress, cage bed, crate bed at home, even as a dog travel bed in a car or truck. It arrives as a vacuum-packed bed in a box, so please let it inflate for about 24 hours before using.

name: Bedsure ComfyFleece Orthopedic Dog Beds Large Sized Dog, Waterproof Memory Foam Pet Couch Sofa with Sides, Non-Slip Bottom and Egg-Crate Foam Large Pet Bed with Washable Corduroy Cover, Grey
short_description: Orthopedic Support:Experience a perfect combination of two of our signature fabrics. High-density memory foam ensures pressure relief with joint support while our intuitive egg-crate foam helps distribute weight evenly. This blissful blend of cozy materials provides an optimal balance of softness and support. Rest assured your pet will enjoy the ultimate dog sofa specifically designed for dreamy restful sleep.

Enhanced Function & Comfort：Our orthopedic dog sofa is thoughtfully designed with a three-sided bolster providing unmatched cushioning for ultimate comfort and security. The bolster is also filled with bouncy and fluffy fabrications specifically intended for head and neck support. Its overall structure sits at a low profile making easily accessible for pets with joint or knee problems.

Supremely Soft Textures Embodied in Versatile Minimalism：Our spacious and cozy dog bed, crafted with supremely soft faux fur for ultimate comfort, ensures rejuvenating rest for your pet year-round, while its stylish corduroy design and fashionable color palettes blend seamlessly with any home décor, adding a versatile minimalist and eye-catching modern touch.

Waterproof & Effortless Care：Our pet bed’s interior lining is designed to protect against water damage which also includes unwanted liquids or spillage. We also take pride in ensuring that our pet beds are hassle free when it comes to cleaning and maintenance. Simply remove the zipped cover in seconds and machine-wash for unlimited freshness.

Pre-Safe Fabrics：Proudly certified by OEKO-TEX Standard 100（24.HCN.46956）and CertiPUR-US which are trusted authorities in fabric safety. Each of our foams feature non-toxic materials that undergo comprehensive safety and health guidelines. The non-slip bottom of the bed is also thoughtfully designed with rubberized dots for stability and foundation, reducing slips while offering structured safety.

name: JOEJOY Rectangle Dog Bed for Large Medium Small Dogs - Washable Orthopedic Sofa Bed, Soft Breathable Puppy & Pet Cuddler, Durable Calming Dog Bed with Anti-Slip Bottom, Multiple Sizes, Beige
short_description: 🐶Supportive Design: JOEJOY Rectangle Dog Bed is specifically designed to provide excellent support and comfort for your furry friend. With raised four walls and a pillow-like structure, it offers excellent support and cushioning for their head and neck while reducing exposure to drafts. The low leading-edge design also ensures easy access for your pet. Your buddies will love the feel of the comfortable sleeping area.

🐶Luxury and Soft Material: Our Pet bed is covered in rose swirl short faux fur and cozy suede fabric, providing the ultimate luxury and softness. It is perfect for keeping your pet warm and comfortable during the winter, effectively retaining their body heat. The bottom and sides are filled with thick, high-resilience polyester fiber, creating a breathable and comfortable sleeping environment that keeps your dog off the floor, ensuring elevated comfort for your pet while snoozing.

🐶Multiple Size Options: We offer a range of sizes to cater to dogs of different breeds and sizes. Whether you have a small, medium, or large dog, our dog bed has the perfect size for them. For medium dogs, the outer size is 30"x24"x9", and the inner size is 22"x17". Please review the measurements to ensure the correct fit for your pet. If you're unsure, we recommend choosing one size up for extra comfort.

🐶Non-Slip and Durable: Our dog bed features a non-slip bottom, ensuring that it stays in place on tile and hardwood floors. The durable construction of the bed maintains its shape like a rectangular sofa, providing long-lasting support for your pet. The puppy bed can be used on the ground, in a crate, on a sofa, or even in the backseat of a car. With its neutral and cozy color, it can easily match any furniture and any space.

🐶 Easy to Clean: We understand that accidents happen, which is why our dog bed is designed to be easy to clean. It is completely machine washable, although we recommend hand washing for best results. After washing, make sure to thoroughly dry the bed in the dryer on low heat; avoid air drying.
